answers.text:
Hi Pamela, 
I believe the article "What Works: Management Applications of Performance Measurement in Local Government" may be of use to your member. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/7245
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Pamela Muse
text:
Does your agency conduct an annual (quarterly, etc) survey with your suppliers/vendors re: their satisfaction levels with the city/county?
If so, please email me the survey and/or link to the survey.  Your time is appreciated.
Pam
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Annual Vendor/Supplier Survey
